item.title: For Fans By Fans: Black Friday Sale and New Collection!
item.dc:creator: nate
item.description:
Those of you who are looking to get some cool Vocaloid-themed merchandise, mark your calendars – For Fans By Fans is having a Black Friday special on all things Hatsune Miku on their website beginning on November 25th. You’ll be able to get discounts of up to 75% off! All Miku merchandise can be found …

The post For Fans By Fans: Black Friday Sale and New Collection! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Those of you who are looking to get some cool Vocaloid-themed merchandise, mark your calendars – For Fans By Fans is having a Black Friday special on all things Hatsune Miku on their website beginning on November 25th. You’ll be able to get discounts of up to 75% off!

All Miku merchandise can be found at this link: https://ffbf.link/Miku

A Brand New Collection

We are also very excited for you to see the Cosmic Wanderer collection that was recently announced from For Fans By Fans, with beautiful galaxy-themed art done by WAWA! There’s a number of merchandise to look through, including acrylic stands, stickers, pillow cases, mugs, and mouse pads!

Browse the collection here: https://ffbf.link/mikucosmic

There’s never been a better time to plan out how to increase your collection with adorable Vocaloid merchandise!

The post For Fans By Fans: Black Friday Sale and New Collection! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Crypton Future Media VOCALOID Voicelibraries are 20% Off via SonicWire!
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
Here we have an amazing deal for every producer that aimed to buy one or more vocalists from Crypton Future Media‘s most popular cast! Hatsune Miku V4X and her Friends are in Sale! That’s right! If you ever wanted to buy Hatsune Miku or any other Piapro character’s voice for your musical project, this might …

The post Crypton Future Media VOCALOID Voicelibraries are 20% Off via SonicWire! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Here we have an amazing deal for every producer that aimed to buy one or more vocalists from Crypton Future Media‘s most popular cast!

Hatsune Miku V4X and her Friends are in Sale!

That’s right! If you ever wanted to buy Hatsune Miku or any other Piapro character’s voice for your musical project, this might be your time to shine!

『初音ミク V4X』ら、クリプトン製バーチャルシンガー製品（ダウンロード版）が20％OFF！ https://t.co/qzfauFGWxG pic.twitter.com/KAwElVaraO

— SONICWIRE 公式 (@cfm_sonicwire) July 16, 2019

All of their download version voicelibraries are currently in sale for 20% off of their standard price! Are you interested perhaps? Let’s have a look together!

  • Hatsune Miku V4X – 13,840 JPY
  • Hatsune Miku V4X Bundle – 17,280 JPY
  • Kagamine Rin & Len V4X – 13,840 JPY
  • Kagamine Rin & Len V4X Bundle – 17,280 JPY
  • Megurine Luka V4X – 13,840 JPY
  • MEIKO V3 – 13,840 JPY
  • KAITO V3 – 13,840 JPY

This sale is only available for a limited amount of time and will end on July 31th, so be fast to grab your favorite vocalist among them!

And don’t forget to follow us in our Social Medias as well!

Hatsune Miku is on Facebook (English and Japanese), Twitter (English and Japanese), Youtube and Weibo!

 

The post Crypton Future Media VOCALOID Voicelibraries are 20% Off via SonicWire! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Concert Tickets for Miku Expo 2018 Europe in Cologne, Germany Now On Sale
item.dc:creator: mikufan.com
item.description:
For you German Hatsune Miku fans that have been patiently waiting, live event tickets for Miku Expo 2018 Europe in Cologne, Germany are now on sale! Concert ticket prices are as follows: – VIP: 98.90€ – Platzgruppe 1: 68.90€ – Platzgruppe 2: 49.90€ Buy your tickets for the Lanxess Arena here: https://shop.tickets-direkt.de/webshop/webticket/eventlist?production=120&map%5B%27venue%27%5D=172 The Miku Expo …

The post Concert Tickets for Miku Expo 2018 Europe in Cologne, Germany Now On Sale appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
For you German Hatsune Miku fans that have been patiently waiting, live event tickets for Miku Expo 2018 Europe in Cologne, Germany are now on sale! Concert ticket prices are as follows:

– VIP: 98.90€
– Platzgruppe 1: 68.90€
– Platzgruppe 2: 49.90€

Buy your tickets for the Lanxess Arena here: https://shop.tickets-direkt.de/webshop/webticket/eventlist?production=120&map%5B%27venue%27%5D=172

The Miku Expo 2018 in Europe tour begins in Paris, France on December 1st, and will also visit Cologne, Germany on December 4th, and London, U.K. on December 8th.

Miku Expo 2018 Europe Official Page: http://mikuexpo.com/europe2018/

Source: Mikufan.com

The post Concert Tickets for Miku Expo 2018 Europe in Cologne, Germany Now On Sale appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Buy MAIKA and Get Bruno & Clara for Free!
item.dc:creator: Hoshi
item.description:
December 18th marks VOCALOID MAIKA‘s anniversary! To celebrate her third birthday, Voctro Labs is holding a special anniversary sale until December 22nd! The Sale Until December 22nd, fans can purchase the boxed version of MAIKA for €99 (about $104 USD) and receive the boxed version of Bruno & Clara for free! Bruno and Clara’s boxed version costs €109 …

The post Buy MAIKA and Get Bruno & Clara for Free! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
December 18th marks VOCALOID MAIKA‘s anniversary! To celebrate her third birthday, Voctro Labs is holding a special anniversary sale until December 22nd!

The Sale

Until December 22nd, fans can purchase the boxed version of MAIKA for €99 (about $104 USD) and receive the boxed version of Bruno & Clara for free! Bruno and Clara’s boxed version costs €109 (about $114 USD).

This sale applies ONLY to the boxed versions of the softwares. You can’t purchase MAIKA’s download version and receive downloads of Bruno & Clara.

In addition, these purchases don’t come with the VOCALOID Editor. In order to use these VOCALOIDs fully, you’ll have to purchase either the VOCALOID 3 or VOCALOID 4 Editor separately. They do, however, come with the Tiny VOCALOID Editor to get you started.

About the VOCALOIDs

Bruno, Clara, and MAIKA are all Spanish VOCALOIDs made by Voctro Labs. MAIKA, however, has phonemes that make her able to sing in a variety of languages. Official demos show her singing in Catalan, Italian, English, and Japanese. This makes her voice bank incredibly versatile.

Bruno and Clara don’t have the extra phonemes but still offer incredible voices. And with the deal of getting them both for free, it’s hard to pass up! The Spanish VOCALOID trio is definitely not one to miss and now’s a great time for lovers of the boxed versions to grab all three for an insanely low price!

How to Purchase

You can purchase MAIKA’s boxed and digital versions on Voctro’s website here. You can also check out Bruno and Clara here. The product pages also provide demos of their respective VOCALOIDs, so be sure to check them out!

You can also skim the VocaDB pages of the three for even more songs.

MAIKA
Bruno
Clara

Please note that VocaDB is not affiliated with Voctro Labs and is simply a database created by the community. Unless specifically marked as an official demo, the song isn’t officially recognized by Voctro Labs.

You can also follow MAIKA on Facebook here.

The post Buy MAIKA and Get Bruno & Clara for Free! appeared first on VNN.
